item.description:
ARRIVE EARLY BEFORE ROADS CLOSE FOR WOBURN HALLOWEEN PARADE 12:30pm

UPDATE:PLEASE NOTE THAT THE NFL AND PATRIOTS WEB SITES PROVIDED INCORRECT INFO ON GAME START TIME. THE CORRECT GAME TIME IS 1:00PM PLEASE UPDATE YOUR RSVPs AND SORRY FOR THE CONFUSION.

Invited Groups are Wakefield Weeknights, Beantown and Beyond, Boston Happy Hour

From Fenway Frank with the Red Sox Natives Group!  

"Join us at Scoreboard for a Patriots Game Viewing Party to watch the the New England Patriots take on the St. Louis Rams on Sunday, October 28 from the UK.

Arrive early at 12:30pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing. This will be a mix of an informal gathering near the bar area and a smaller reserved table section. We strongly suggest that fans arrive early before game time and get a table reservation with us as Scoreboard will be very busy.

***Game Time is 1:00pm.

Scoreboard Manager and Natives Assistant Organizer Lauren will have a full house.

There is no event fee.

Stay for the whole game or leave whenever.

The Red Sox Natives organized weekly viewing parties last year with guests from several other invited groups attending. We had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Scoreboard has been one of our venues for watching Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins and Celtics games over the past several years.

For more info http://www.tpsscoreboard.com

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. 

PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess or Lauren for The Red Sox Natives
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party@Scoreboard Pats vs St. Louis Rams in UK Red Sox Natives
